entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
